content: गहन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Deep, dense, thick. {@--2@} impervious, impenetrable, impassable, inaccessible. {@--3@} Hard to be understood, inexplicable, mysterious; सेवाधर्मः परमगहनो योगिनामप्यगम्यः <ls>Pt. 1. 11</ls>, <ls n="Pt. 1.">285</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 58</ls>; गहना कर्मणो गतिः <ls>Bg. 4. 17</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 1. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Grave, dignified; <ls>Māl. 1. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Impassioned, replete with love, strong; <ls>U. 6. 33.</ls> {@--6@} Hard, difficult, causing pain or trouble; गहनसंसारः <ls>Śānti. 3. 15</ls>; <ls>U. 7. 6.</ls> {@--7@} Deepened, intensified; <ls>Māl. 1. 30.</ls> --नं {@--1@} An abyss, depth. {@--2@} A wood, thicket, deep or impenetrable forest; यदनुगमनाय निशि गहनमपि शीलितं <ls>Gīt. 7</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 25.</ls> {@--3@} A hiding-place. {@--4@} A cave. {@--5@} Pain, distress. {@--6@} An ornament. {@--7@} Water. --नः The Supreme Being.
